A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class GameTimer
depending on the type the timer will, reload the shooters gun, cause enemies to shoot, activate and deactivate power ups, pause and un-pause the game, spawn power ups

randomly (weighted) selects a powerUp and activates it

width - Variable in class Button
the x, y, height and width are all final private and final as they are never changed the background colour changes and is thus not final the caption is added after the object is created and thus cannot be final (the constructor conplains)
